Use a wide-brimmed hat: A wide-brimmed hat can provide excellent protection from the sun's harmful rays. It covers a large area of the head and protects the scalp from direct sunlight.
Apply sunscreen: Sunscreen can be applied to the scalp to protect it from sunburn. It is important to choose a sunscreen with a high SPF (Sun Protection Factor) to ensure maximum protection.
Wear a scarf: A scarf can be worn around the head to provide additional protection from the sun. It can be tied in a variety of ways to cover different areas of the scalp.
Use a hairless wig: A hairless wig can be worn to cover the head and protect it from the sun. It can be made from a variety of materials, including synthetic fibers or natural hair.

Wear a beanie: A beanie can be worn around the head to provide protection from the sun. It can be made from a variety of materials, including cotton or wool, and can be worn in a variety of ways to cover different areas of the scalp.
